New Records: Canada secured third place in the Copa América after a loss to Uruguay.
Uruguay won the penalty shootout 4-3 against Canada to claim victory.
Key Match Events: Canada scored an 80th-minute goal that was nearly the winner.
Uruguay equalized in stoppage time, forcing a penalty shootout.
The match went into a penalty shootout after the dramatic late goal.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Portland Timbers goalkeeper Maxime Crépeau and defender Kamal Miller were available but did not play in the match.
